name: Roots and Woods
description:
Description

You are a beaver. And a parent. You need to get food for your starving puppies.
Cross some busy roads while avoiding the cars, gather some fruits and vegetables to eat (because you might get hungry too), until you find enough food for your family.

Made by:
  • Nilton Calegari - Programmer/Game Designer
  • Thomas A. de Souza - Lead Programmer
  • Matheus L. da Silva - Honorary Artist / UI Designer
  • Gustavo Davila - Musician / Sound Engineer
